title: Applique Quilt
description: outer red border on three sides; inner blue border surrounding many square sections of four appliqued squares with looped center design in red and blue on white; couched thread surrounds each applique; squares are similar but not identical; unlined
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
